name: Dragonframe
description: Dragonframe is software for stop motion filmmaking, with DMX programming capabilities.
fixtureUsage: You don't need to download the fixtures, just click on the library button in the bottom statusbar and click update.
However, if the device you run AGLight on is not connected to the internet,
you can also copy the exported fixture library to that device.
See below for the directory paths. You need to rename the file to library.json.
